house_listing.house_description: Old world charm in a newer home! Fha appraised at $139,000 & home inspected, this 3 bdrm, 2.5 bth home with eat-in kitchen, lr, dr & attached garage is a real steal. Call office or agent to show.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Fenced, Garage DoorOpener, Microwave, Pantry, Victorian Style
